Suas habilidades lhe permitem causar uma colisÃƒÂ£o, manipulando semÃƒÂ¡foros em um cruzamento, conectar-se ao sistema de monitoramento municipal ou invadir os telefones de pessoas que ele passa por aprender mais sobre eles e, por exemplo, influenciam o seu dia a dia, de alguma forma (salvo los de um ladrÃƒÂ£o, ajudÃƒÂ¡-los a se vingar, etc.) Talentos Pearce lhe permitem controlar quase todos os elementos do mundo moderno que o rodeia.

Watch_Dogs is an innovative action game with an open-structured city of Chicago, stuffed with cutting-edge technologies, in which the most powerful weapon of the protagonist are his hacking skills. The game is a work of several studies led by Ubisoft Montreal which is known for game series such as AssassinÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Creed, Tom ClancyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Rainbow Six, or Far Cry.
The players assume the role of Aiden Pearce, a former criminal and an anti-hero, who is an expert in hacking. His skills enable him to cause a collision by manipulating traffic lights at an intersection, connect to the municipal monitoring system or hack into phones of people he passes by to learn more about them and, for example, influence their daily life in some way (save them from a thief, help them to take revenge etc.). Pearce talents allow him to control almost every element of the modern world that surrounds him.

Developer:	Ubisoft
Publisher:	Ubisoft
Genre: 	Action-Adventure
Platform:	PC
Release Date:	27 May 2014
Language:	English
Media Size:	9.6 GB
Suggested system requirements:	Core i7 3.5 GHz, 8 GB RAM, graphic card 2 GB (GeForce GTX 660 or better), 25 GB HDD, Windows Vista(SP2)/7(SP1)/8 64-bit
